name: Ace Thought Technologies
tag_list: software-codecs, h-264, h-263, vc-1, mpeg-4, mpeg-2, android, ios, video-codecs, audio-codecs, multicore
description: State of the art software codecs
overview:
Ace Thought Technologies is a technology company specializing in Video & Audio Codec software solutions for multimedia applications. It was founded in 2009 by IIT Alumni, Munish Jindal. It’s Products and Services include:

  • Embedded Software Codecs for Multi-Core/Single-Core ARM processors (Cortex-A8, A9, A15) on Android, iOS, Linux o H.264, VC-1, WMV9, MPEG-4, H.263, MPEG-2, HE-AAC, AAC, MP3

  • Software development for Multi-Core CPU (ARM, Intel, AMD) and GPUs (Nvidia).

  • Application development on Mobile Platforms like iPhone, Android.

The company caters to clients from all over the world, from leading European MNCs to small & medium sized companies, in the Broadcast/ IPTV, Automotive, Security & Video Communications Industry. It is headquartered in Chandigarh, India.

offices.address1: ITC-7, KMG Towers, 2nd Floor, IT Park, Sector 67,
